sentences.sContent: The United States was working to desegregate the military, schools, and all public facilities.
sentences.sCn: 美国当时正在着手废除对军队、学校和所有公共设施实施的种族隔离。

remMethod.val: de(反) + se(分离) + greg(群) + ate → 反对分离群体 → 废除种族隔离

trans.tranOther: to end a system in which people of different races are kept separate
